jobDescription: Data Scientist - Precision Medicine  My client is a rapidly growing biotech firm with cutting-edge technology and product portfolio for protein biomarker discovery and development. They seek a Data Scientist to collaborate with the global data science group and provide innovative solutions.  The ideal candidate will take on the following tasks: Provide data analysis support and lead in the design, analysis, and interpretation of translational research experiments for internal and external customers.Offer statistical consultation to customers and collaborators.Promote innovative study design and analysis methodology.Supply statistical input in planning translational experiments to adequately support POC.Advise and educate biomarker and clinical scientists on the use of correct statistical techniques and promote innovative design and analysis methodology.Contribute to biomarker assay development and validation. The ideal candidate will possess the following qualities: MS/PhD in Statistics, Bioinformatics, Computer Science, Molecular Biology or similar.5+ years of relevant experience of advanced data analysis and statistics.Demonstrated strong ability to work across different teams and disciplines.Programming skills in R. Skills in other methods and languages such as Python and SQL is an advantage.Experience in applying statistical methods in medical or biological research, especially with data from high throughput technologies in proteomics and genomics.Exceptional communication and collaboration skills.
